portfolio.title: Space Travelers' Hub
portfolio.description: In this Project, the actual live data from the SpaceX API. The task is to build a web application for a company that provides commercial and scientific space travel services. The application will allow users to book rockets and join selected space missions.
portfolio.tech-stack: React, JSX, Redux, Bootstrap, Redux, Jest, JavaScript

portfolio.title: Forex App
portfolio.description: This is a React mobile app featuring different forex rates for all major currencies. The project uses an API from VAT Comply.
portfolio.tech-stack: React, JSX, Redux, Bootstrap, Redux, Jest , JavaScript

portfolio.title: Bookstore
portfolio.description: This is Bookstore App built with JavaScript (ES6) that mimics a library where a user can add/remove books using the Bookstore API. It splits the code base into modules for easy management.
portfolio.tech-stack: React, JSX, Redux, Bootstrap, Redux, Jest , JavaScript

portfolio.title: To-do App
portfolio.description: This project is an app that displays a can be used to manage your to-do lists. It allows you to add and remove tasks from the list
portfolio.tech-stack: Ruby on Rails, SQL lite, Rspec, Rubocop, Bootstrap, JavaScript
